content:
I think there might be some confusion! The Modern Art Museum is a generic term, and there are several modern art museums around the world. I was assuming you were referring to the Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) in New York City.

If you visited a different modern art museum, could you please tell me which one it was? I'd be happy to help you find information about the exhibitions and collections you saw during your visit.

Also, if you have any questions about the artworks or artists you saw, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to provide you with more information!
